biotools.summary: Cyto is a docker-based application to run Anduril analysis pipelines on high dimensional cytometry data. Cyto aims to make available new computational cytometry tools to scientists with and without a bioinformatics background. Writing analysis pipelines using the workflow platform Anduril enables language-agnostic integration of new methods, Docker allows multi-OS compatibility, and Python libraries (flask and dash) allow user interaction.
